sūktam japtvā asyavāmīyam kṣipram mucyeta kilbiṣāt
jñāti putra suhṛd mitraiḥ yaḥ ca rājyam cikīrṣati
nityam sa niyataḥ bhūtvā sūktam tu manasā japet
kayā śubhāḥ iti paiśunyam kṛtvā ācārya nṛpa dvijaiḥ
śrutvā apara rahasyam tu guroḥ api āha śaunakaḥ
imam nu somam iti ete dve ṛcau prayataḥ japet
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti na kiṃcid pātakam bhavet
pitumnu iti upatiṣṭheta nityam annam upasthitam
pūjayet aśanam nityam bhuñjīyāt avikutsitam
na asya syāt anna jaḥ vyādhiḥ viṣam api anna tām iyāt
viṣam ca pītvā etat sūktam japeta viṣa nāśanam
na avāgyataḥ tu bhuñjīta na aśuciḥ na jugupsitam
dadyāt ca pūjayet ca eva juhuyāt ca śuciḥ sadā
kṣudh bhayam na asya kiṃcid syāt na anna jam vyādhim āpnuyāt
utpatha pratipannaḥ yaḥ bhraṣṭaḥ vā api pathaḥ kvacid
panthānam pratipadyeta kṛtvā vā a karma garhitam
agne naya eti sūktena pratyṛcam juhuyāt ghṛtam
japan ca prayataḥ nityam upatiṣṭheta ca analam
snātvā japet anarvāṇam namaskṛtya bṛhaspatim
vīrān dhanam ca prāpnoti suślokyam ca niyacchati
kaṅkataḥ na eti sūktam tu viṣa ārtaḥ prayataḥ japet
viṣam na kramate ca asyasarpāt dṛṣṭiviṣāt api
yat kīṭa lūṭa āsu viṣam daṃṣṭri vṛścika jamcayat
maulam ca kṛtrimam ca eva japan sarvam vyapohati
dharmam buddhim dhanam putrān saubhāgyam brahmavarcasam
ārogyam puṣṭim āyuṣyam paśūn vidyām mahat yaśaḥ
tri rātra upoṣitaḥ snātaḥ prayataḥ carita vrataḥ
prāṇaāyāma śatam kṛtvā upatiṣṭhet śatakratum
eka aham kṣura samyuktaḥ pādau saṃdhāya vāgyataḥ
yaḥ jāta eti sūktena ṛṣim gṛtsamadam smaran
śata kṛtvas japet etat indra śreṣṭha eti ca antataḥ
eka ahāt labhate vittam dvi ahāt siddhim anuttamām
ahobhiḥ tribhiḥ ārogyam caturbhiḥ aśanam bahu
pañcabhiḥ brahmavarcasyam ṣaḍbhiḥ āyuḥ sukha āvaham
saptabhiḥ tanayān puṣṭim aṣṭa hiḥ prāpnuyāt yaśaḥ
priyaḥ bhavati ca aindrasya priyam dhāma sagacchati
ripu ghnam dasyu śamanam rāyas pṣa karam param
gaṇānām iti yat sūktam tat japet sukha vardhanam
saṃdhyayoḥ prayataḥ tu etat japet nityam bṛhaspatim
upatiṣṭheta sūktena sarva kāma samṛddhaye
yaḥ ume rājan iti imām tu duh svapna śamanīm ṛcam
japtvā anāśayati kṣipram duhsvapnam brāhmaṇaḥ śuciḥ
ahorātram upoṣya ekam niyataḥ brahma vittamaḥ
prajā artham juhuyāt ājyam carum vā payasi śritam
rākām aham iti imābhiḥ ṣaṣṭhyām śuklasya pañcabhiḥ
haviḥ śeṣam svayam prāśya vindate mahatīm prajām
vyādhinā ayaḥ abhibhūtaḥsyāt ghoreṇa prāṇa hāriṇā
caturdaśīm upoṣya ekām kṛṣṇasya juhuyāt carum
ātesūktena raudreṇa pratyṛcam vāgyataḥ śuciḥ
pūrvam ājya āhutīḥ hutvā atha upasthāya śaṃkaram
haviḥ śeṣeṇa varteta ekāntaram atandritaḥ
pūrṇe māsi japet mṛtyum rogebhyaḥ ca pramucyate
abhiśasya itayaḥ mohāt kuryāt vā karma garhitam
snātvā abhuñjan japet apsuambī iti ṛcam atandritaḥ
adhvani prasthitaḥ yaḥ tu paśyet śakunim utthitam
a praśastam praśastam vā āsthitvā aikṣya prayataḥ japet
kanikradat iti sūktābhyām upatiṣṭhet kṛta svaram
śakunim vāyasam vā api mṛgam daṃṣṭriṇam eva ca
api a dṛṣṭvā eva japtavyam etat taskara mohana me
kalyāṇa vādī iva anyaḥ vāna vārauti na dṛśyate
japet eva namaskṛtya siddha arthaḥ san nivartate
na tasya asti bhayam kiṃcid dasyubhyaḥ adhvani vā kvacid
tarati api ca durgāṇi svastimān ca sukhībhavet
yasya bhuktam na jīryeta na tiṣṭhet vā kathaṃcana
dhyātvā asaḥ attāram annasya agniḥ asmi iti ṛcam japet
viśvāmitrasya saṃvādam nadī atikramaṇe japet
āplutasya ācamya vidhivat udakasya añjalim kṣipet
namaḥ sravadbhyaḥ iti etat yoni tyam hi samācaret
tam nadyaḥ srotasaḥ pānti svam putram iva mātaraḥ
bhayam ca asyana vidyate nadī tīra careṣu api
jala carebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ śīta auṣṇaiḥ na ca bādhyate
pūrṇām titīrṣuḥ saritam ramadhvam iti saṃsmaret
o su iti ṛcam apām madhye japet yaḥ vainadīm taran
sa śīghram tīram āpnoti gādham vā āvindate dvijaḥ
yuktena eva rathena āśu yaḥ apāmpāram titīrṣati
udvaūrmiḥ iti imām tu japeta niyataḥ svayam
adhvānam prasthitaḥ ca evam āmandraiḥ iti saṃsmaret
kāryāṇi aśeṣatas kṛtvā punar āyāti vaigṛham
a dātāram su puṣṭa artham sarvadā āviṣṭa cetanam
hatvā tad dhanam anvicchet kim te kṛṇvanti iti smaran
indrāparvata etisūktam āyuṣyam drāviṇam smṛtam
vāc indriya pramūḍhaḥ yona vidyām pratipadyate
indriya arthāni atha artha anvāyaḥ na vetti kathaṃcana
vidyāvā adhigatā yasya praṇaśyeta punar punar
sa sarparīḥ ṛcau japan dvaumāsau pratipadyate
anasā a samprayātaḥ tu sthirau gāvau iti smaret
catasraḥ kuśalena eti siddha arthaḥ sthirayā anugaḥ
yāna akṣam apabhagna antam dṛṣṭvā durge adhvani dvijaḥ
abhivyayasva eti japet dvṛcam akṣa balam dadhat
kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśyām tri rātrau upoṣitaḥ śuciḥ
dakṣiṇa pravaṇe deśe śmaśāna sthaḥ samāhitaḥ
rakta oṣṇīṣī asi pāṇiḥ ca bailva kaidhmaḥ nila aśanaḥ
sapta aham juhuyāt tailam sārṣapa mlavaṇa anvitam
samidhaḥ rājavṛkṣasya vasiṣṭha dveṣiṇīḥ paṭhan
yam dviṣyāt tasya kṛtvā tu śamyākena ākṛtim niśi
adhiṣṭhāya catām kuryāt ṛgbhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ dvijaḥ
uddiśya nāma homaḥ ayam sapta rātram na jīvati
na asya kaścid avadhyaḥ asti japataḥ juhvataḥ apivā
dvāviṃśakam japet sūktam ādhyātmikam anuttamam
parvasu prayataḥ nityam iṣṭān kāmān samaśnute
bṛhaspatim aja aśvam ca savitāram babhrum eva ca
ṛtāvṛdhau dine dine tṛcaiḥ pañcabhiḥ anvaham
bṛhaspate eti pañca aham pratyṛcam juhuyāt ghṛtam
hutvā agnim arcayitvā tu gandha mālyaiḥ sa dhūpakaiḥ
tāḥ eva devatāḥ pañca kāmaiḥ arcanti pañcabhiḥ
ratnaiḥ apatyaiḥ paśubhiḥ makhaiḥ dīrgheṇa ca āyuṣā
atha veda ādigītāyāḥ prasāda jananam vidhim
gāyatryāḥ sampravakṣyāmi dharma kāma artha mokṣa dam
nitye naimittike kāmye tritaye tu parāyaṇam
gāyatryāḥ tu param na asti iha loke paratra ca
japet lakṣa trayam dhīmān ananya mānasa kriyaḥ
karmabhiḥ yojayet paścāt kramaśas sva aicchayā api vā
yāvat kāryam
ādityasya odaye snātvā sahasram pratyaham japet
āyuḥ ārogyam aiśvaryam dhanam ca labhate dhruvam
tri rātra upoṣitaḥ samyak ghṛtam hutvā sahasraśas
sahasra lābham āpnoti
pālāśa samidhām ca eva ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
sahasra lābham āpnoti rāhu sūrya samāgame
sahasram homam āpnoti rāhu sūrya samāgamet
raktacandana miśram tusa ghṛtam havyavāhane
hutvā gomayam āpnoti sahasram go dhanam dvijaḥ
yasyāḥ tu goḥ gomayena guṭikānām sahasraśas
hutvā tām gām avāpnoti ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
yavaiḥ aśvān tilaiḥ hastīn mahiṣyaḥ yāvakaiḥ tathā
śālī tāṇḍula homena kanyā lābham avāpnuyāt
jātī campaka rāja arka kusumānām sahasraśas
hutvā vastrāṇi avāpnoti ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
sūryabimbe jala madhye toyam hutvā sahasraśas
sahasram prāpnuyāt haimam raupyam indu maye hute
alakṣmī pāpa samyuktaḥ umala vyādhi vināyakaiḥ
mucyet sahasra japtena snāyāt yaḥ tu jalena vai
yām diśam sapta japtena loṣṭena sampracāṭayet
caura agni māruta autthāni bhayāni na bhavanti vai
kṣīra āhāraḥ japet lakṣam apamṛtyum vyapohati
ghṛta āśī prāpnuyāt medhyām bahu vijñāna saṃcayam
hutvā vetasa patrāṇi ghṛta aktāni huta aśane
lakṣāt varṣāpayet devam sārvabhaumam na saṃśayaḥ
lakṣeṇa bhasma homa sya kṛtyā hi uttiṣṭhate jalāt
āditya abhimukhaḥ sthitvā na abhimātre jale śuciḥ
tilānām lakṣa homena ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
sarva kāma samṛddha ātmā aparām siddhim avāpnuyāt
yavānām lakṣa homena ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
sarva kāma samṛddha ātmā aparam sthānam avāpnuyāt
ghṛtasya āhuti lakṣeṇa sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
pañcagavya aśanaḥ lakṣam japet jātismaraḥ bhavet
tat eva hi anala lehu tvā prāpnoti bahu śodhanam
anna adya havanāt nityam anna adyam ca bhavet sadā
juhuyāt sarva sādhyānām āhuti ayuta saṃkhyayā
rakta siddha arthakān hutvā sarvān sādhayate ripūn
lavaṇam madhu samyuktam hutvā sarvam vaśaḥ bhavet
hutvā āhu karavīrāṇi raktāni janayet jvaram
hutvā vaibhītakam tailam deśāt eva pracāṭayet
raktānām taṇḍulānām tu ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
hutvā balam avāpnoti śatrubhiḥ na jīyate
pratyānayana siddhi artham madhu sarpiḥ samanvitam
gavyam kṣīram pradīpte agnau juhvataḥ tat praśāmyati
brahmacārī mita āhāraḥ yaḥ sahasra trayam japet
saṃvatsareṇa labhate dhana aiśvaryam na saṃśayaḥ
śamī bilva palāśānām arkasya tu viśeṣataḥ
puṣpāṇām samidhām ca eva hutvā haimam avāpnuyāt
a brahma tryambaka ādīnām yasya āyatanam āśritaḥ
japet lakṣam nirāhāraḥ sa tasya vara daḥ bhavet
bilvānām lakṣa homena ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
parām śriyam avāpnoti yadi na bhrūṇa hā bhavet
padmānām lakṣa homena ghṛta aktānām huta aśane
prāpnoti rājyam nikhilam asapatnam akaṇṭakam
pañcaviṃśati lakṣeṇa dadhi kṣīra ghṛta aśanaḥ
sva dehe sidhyate jantuḥ kauśikasya matam yathā
eka aham pañcagavya āśī eka aham māruta aśanaḥ
eka aham brāhmaṇa anna āśī gāyatrī japaḥ ucyate
śatena gāyatryā snātvā śatam antar jale japet
śatena apaḥ tatas pītvā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
godhnaḥ pitṛ ghnaḥ mātṛ ghnaḥ brahma hā guru talpaṇaḥ
suvarṇa ratna hārīca yaḥ ca vipraḥ surām pibet
a yājya yājanam kṛtvā a kṛtvā ava a karma garhitam
na sīdet pratigṛhṇānaḥ mahīm api sa sāgarām
ye ca asya duhsthitā loke grahāḥ sūrya ādayaḥ bhuvi
te yānti saumya tām sarve śivāḥ iti na saṃśayaḥ
kṛṇuṣva eti japan sūktam rakṣaḥ ghnam dasyubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
arātīnām haret prāṇān rakṣāṃsi apinanāśayet
upatiṣṭheta yo vahnim pari iti ṛcā dine dine
tam rakṣati svayam vahniḥ viśvatas viśvatomukhaḥ
śakram arcati
japet vā atha namaskāraiḥ śakrataḥ labhate varān
kayā iti vāmadevyena kuryāt svastyayanam niśi
japet vā saṃdhivelā su brahma etat kuśika uditam
haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti ṛcā aśuciḥ īkṣet divākaram
antakāle japan eti brahmaṇaḥ sadma śāśvatam
kṛṣim prapadyamānaḥ tu sthālīpākam yathāvidhi
juhuyāt kṣetra madhye tu śunam vāha astu pañcabhiḥ
yathāliṅgam tu viharet lāṅgalam kṛṣīvalaḥ
indrāya ca marudbhyaḥ ca parjanyāya bhagāya ca
pūṣṇedhānyāya sītāyai śunāsīram atha auttaram
hutvā tu pṛthak etāsām yajet etāḥ ca devatāḥ
gandha mālya aupahāraiḥ ca phala lāja surā āsavaiḥ
pravapaṇe pralavane khala sītā upahārayoḥ
etāḥ eva yajet nityam devatā vidhinā aśuciḥ
amogham karma bhavati kṛṣiḥ vardhati sarvadā
kṣetrasya patinā iti etat kṣaitrapatyam tṛcam japet
īkṣet sūryam dvijaḥ nityam vindate kṣetram uttamam
ākhu utkara iṣu caruṇā yajet etena mūṣikān
citraiḥ drājā iti anayā stutvā ca ākhu patim sadā
brāhmaṇān bhojayet atrakīnāśān ca eva bhojayet
apramattaḥ śānti paraḥ svayam eva kṛṣim vrajet
eteṣu yat kṛtam pāpam khala dānena śudhyati
dhānyānām viṃśakam bhāgam śrotriyebhyaḥ nivedayet
viṃśakasya hi dānena kṛṣi doṣāt pramucyate
samudrāditi sūktena yaḥsadā juhuyāt ghṛtam
pūrva uktena eva kalpena samyataḥ ātmā ajita aindriyaḥ
vijyotiṣā iti jvalayet yatra ecchet jātavedasi
tam agniḥ sarvatas pāti bhadreṇa draviṇena ca
viśvāninā eti dvābhyām ṛgbhyām yaḥ vahnim arcati
sa tarati āpadaḥ sarvāḥ ayaśaḥ prāpnoti ca akṣayam
hutvā vahniḥ ūpa stheyaḥ prāṇa artham havyavāhanaḥ
agne tvam iti sūktena dhanam āyuḥ ca vāñchatā
yaḥ ecchet vividham vittam sattvam ca anupamam mahat
uroḥ te iti sūktena upatiṣṭhet śatakratum
prajā kāmaḥ yajet nityam caruṇā deva patnayaḥ
upahṛtya aupahāram ca śeṣam bhuñjīta avāgyataḥ
ucchiṣṭam ca pradātavyam bhāryāyai putram icchatā
dhenvāḥ sarūpa vatsāyāḥ payasā sādhayet carum
anurūpām prajām āśu labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ
svastyātreyam japet nityam prātar prātar dvijaḥ śuciḥ
etat svastyayanam puṇyam sarva kalmaṣa nāśanam
suhṛdam jñātinam ca eva gacchantam anumantrayet
svasti panthām iti procya svastimān vrajate adhvani
vijihīṣu avanaspate tat idam cyāvanam smṛtam
yam cyāvayitu kāmaḥ syāt cyāvayet tam idam japan
dviṣantam vā āpadā ākramya bhūmau pāṃsu mayīm kṛtim
niṣpekṣyan iva saṃgrāmāt cyavate na atra saṃśayaḥ
striyam garbha pramūḍhām vā āpāyayet anumantritam
udakam cyāvanena eva garbhaḥ adhas cyavate sukham
acchāvadaiti sūktam tu vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ prayojayet
nirāhāraḥ khinna vāsāḥ acireṇa pravarṣati
hutvā ayutam vaitasīnām kṣīra aktānām hutaaśane
mahat varṣam avāpnoti sūktena ācchāvadena hi
yaḥ ecchet vara dām devīm śriyam nityam kule sthitām
sa śuciḥ prayataḥ bhūtvā juhuyāt ājyam anvaham
śriyaḥ pañcadaśa ṛcam ca śrī kāmaḥ satatam japet
āvāhayet śriyam padme pañcabhiḥ kanakaḥ api vā
upahārān upaharet śuklān bhakṣān payaḥ dadhi
sthālīpākam ca śālīnām payasā samprakalpayet
cāndrāyaṇa kṛta ātmā tu prapadyet prayataḥ śriyai
sarva auṣadhībhiḥ phāṇṭābhiḥ snātvā adbhiḥ pāvanaiḥ api
upaitu mām deva sakhaḥ eti rājñaḥ abhiṣecanī
manasaḥ kāmam iti eṣā a paśu kāmā abhiṣecanī
kadarmena eti yaḥ snāyāt prajā kāmaḥ śuci vrataḥ
aśva pūrṇām iti snāyāt rājya kāmaḥ śuci vrataḥ
rohite carmaṇi snāyāt brāhmaṇaḥ tu yathāvidhi
rājā ā carmaṇi vaiyāghre kṣatriyaḥ tu atha raurave
basta carmaṇi vaiśyaḥ tu homaḥ kāryaḥ tu anantaram
candrām iti tu padmāni juhuyāt sarpiṣā dvijaḥ
āditya varṇā iti anayā bilva homaḥ vidhīyate
bilva aidhmaḥ eva vā agniḥ syāt sthālīḥ ca juhuyāt dvijaḥ
daśasāhasrikaḥ homaḥ śrī kāmaḥ prathamaḥ vidhiḥ
hutvā tu prayutam samyak anantām vindate śriyam
ayutam śata kṛtvas tu hutvā a śuklāni sarpiṣā
anantām avyavacchinām śāśvatīm vindate śriyam
aśaktau japaḥ eva auktaḥ daśasāhasrikaḥ varaḥ
ap tva anuprayutam samyak anantām vindate śriyam
ayutam śata kṛtvas tu japtvā śriyam upāśnute
apsu eva juhuyāt nityam padmāni ayutaśas niśi
dṛṣṭvā śriyam tu uparamet kilāsa tvāt bibhetavai
bilva āśī bilva nilayaḥ juhuyāt bilvāni sarpiṣā
ekaviṃśati rātreṇa parām siddhim niyacchati
yena yena ca kāmena juhoti prayataḥ śriyai
padmāni atha api bilvāni sa sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyati
na jātu kṛpaṇa arthāya śriyam āvāhayet kvacid
na yat kiṃcana kāmena homaḥ kāryaḥ kathaṃcana
mahat vā a prārthyamānena rājya kāmena vā a punar
vācaḥ param prārthayitā yatna ādi uktaḥ śriyam yajet
agniḥ etu iti sūktena juhuyāt ājyam anvaham
ojasvinīm avāpnoti prajām dharmavatīm śubhām
acchā naiti ṛcā ādīptam upatiṣṭhet vibhāvasum
prajām prāpya jayet śatrūn tarate duritāni ca
āgāvaitisūktena goṣṭha gā lokamātaraḥ
upatiṣṭhet vrajantīḥ cayaiḥ chet tāḥ sadā akṣayāḥ
tvām id hi iti pragāthena upatiṣṭhet śatakratum
madhya ahne saṃdhyayoḥ ca eva japan dhanam avāpnuyāt
upaiti tisṛbhiḥ rājñaḥ dundubhīn saṃspṛśet raṇe
ojaḥ balam avāpnoti śatrūn ca eva niyacchati
pāṇinā a tṛṇam ādāya yajña a yajña eti yaḥ abhyaset
saḥ adhītasya asya sūktasya phalam prāpnoti na atṛṇaḥ
sūkta ante ca tṛṇam tu agnau iriṇe vā udake api vā
nikṣipet tat prayatnena tyaktvā anyatra bhaya āvaham
tṛṇa pāṇiḥ japan sūktam rakṣaḥ ghnam dasyubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
na bhayam vindate kiṃcid rakṣobhyaḥ aribhyaḥ eva ca
gṛhāt prapadyamānaḥ tu panthānam dhana kāmyayā
japet saḥ adhvani yatnena api panthām iti vrajan
ye ke ca jmā iti ṛcam tu etām dhyāyan niśi divaokasaḥ
agnau hutvā etayā ca ājyam dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnuyāt
vayam utvā iti sūktam tupauṣṇam draviṇa vardhanam
nityam japet śuciḥ bhūtvā dhanam vindati abhīpsitam
yasya naṣṭam bhavet kiṃcid dravyam gauḥ dvipadam dhanam
naśyet vā adhvaniyaḥ mohāt sam pūṣan sa japet niśi
iyam iti etat ādi antam sūktam sārasvatam dvijaḥ
nityam japet śuciḥ bhūtvā vāgmībhavati buddhimān
sam vām iti tuyat sūktam aṣṭa ṛcam traiṣṭubham smṛtam
tat japan prayataḥ nityam iṣṭān kāmān samaśnute
yaḥ adri bhittu yat su uktam tat sapatna nibarhaṇam
bṛhaspatim namaskṛtvā a sapatnān stṛṇute bahūn
enasvī vā a abhiśastaḥ vā a kṛtvā vā a karma garhitam
somāraudram japet sūktam kṛtsnam enaḥ vyapohati
juhuyāt vāyo etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ nityam ghṛta vrataḥ
vāruṇebhyaḥ sa pāśebhyaḥ mucyate īśam tathā āpnuyāt
jīmūtasūktasya vidhim yathāliṅgam avekṣya vai
ṛgbhiḥ karmāṇi kurvīta ratha aṅgānām yathāvidhi
saṃgrāmam tu prayātasya rājñaḥ ca etat prayojayet
sarvāṇi aṅgāni rathyān ca sat aśvān ca anumantrayet
yam eva deśam gaccheta śatrum vā api anumantritaḥ
na a jitvā vinivarteta param hi brahmaṇaḥ balam
putrān āyuḥ atha ārogyam yaiḥ chet avyayam sukham
saḥ agnim naraiti sūktena juhuyāt ājyam anvaham
pra agnaye atha tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ saṃdhyayoḥ japam ārabhet
na rakṣobhya ubhayam vetti dhanam prāpnoti ca akṣayam
abhitvā ayaḥpragāthena nityam arcati vrajiṇam
sa śriyam vipulām bhuṅkte prāpnoti ca dhana āyuṣī
śaṃvatīḥ śamnā aindra agnī iti ete satatam japet
na rakṣobhyaḥ na bhūtebhyaḥ vyādhibhyaḥ vā abhayam bhavet
niveṣṭu kāmaḥ roga ārtaḥ bhaga sūktam sadā abhyaset
niveśam vindate kṣipram rogebhyaḥ ca pramucyate
imāḥ iti japet nityam raudram sūktam dvijaḥ śuciḥ
tat japan prajayā avittaiḥ svayam ca eva nariṣyati
uttitīrṣuḥ apaḥ yaḥ tu śaṅket srotyā samāgame
samudra jyeṣṭhāḥ iti japet sūktam etat bhaya apaham
āditya daivate sūkte ripu ghne roga nāśane
japet prātar śuciḥ bhūtvā ari purogaiḥ pramucyate
vāstoṣpate prati iti etat sūktam vāstoṣpatam japet
snātaḥ kṛtvā vaiśvadevam param brahma edam ucyate
amīva hā iti sūktena bhūtāni svāpayet niśi
nahi prasvāpanam kiṃcid īdṛśam vidyate kvacid
sambādhe viṣame durge baddhaḥ vā nirgataḥ kvacid
palāyan vā a gṛhītaḥ vā taskaraiḥ sa japet idam
amīva hā viśvavatīm uddhṛtya anyāḥ prayojayet
sūktam etat japet sarvam iti manyeta śaunakaḥ
tri rātrim niyataḥ an aśnan śrapayet pāyasam carum
tena āhuti śatam pūrṇam juhuyāt sarpiṣā dvijaḥ
samuddiśya mahādevam tryambakam tryambaka iti ṛcā
etat parva śatam kṛtvā jīvet abda śatam sukhī
tat cakśuḥ iti ṛcā a snātā upatiṣṭhet divākaram
udyantam madhya gam ca eva dīrgham āyuḥ jijīviṣuḥ
rātryā apara kāleyā utthāya prayataḥ śuciḥ
vyuṣā iti upatiṣṭheta ṣaḍbhiḥ sūktaiḥ kṛta añjaliḥ
prāpnuyāt sa hiraṇya ādi nānā rūpam dhanam bahu
gāḥ aśvān puruṣān dhānyam striyaḥ vāsāṃsi aja avikam
tiṣṭhan rātrau japet enām vipāśaḥ samprapadyate
ahorātram sthitaḥ ca evam an aśnan syāt viceṣṭitaḥ
ayaḥ pāśaḥ sphuṭanti asya dāru pāśāḥ tathā eva ca
syonā iti pṛthivīm devīm prapadyet niyataḥ sadā
japet enām catatra api bhūmi pāśāt pramucyate
yat kiṃcid pātakam kuryāt karmaṇā a manasā a girā
yat kiṃca edam varuṇa iti ṛcam japtvā pramucyate
agamyā gamane ca etat prāyaścittam vidhīyate
anyatra gurutalpāt ca tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
dvādaśa aham a bhuñjānaḥ sva gotra āgamane japet
ardha māsam abhuñjānaḥ sakhi dāreṣu saṃvasan
idam āpaḥ pravahata yat kim ca edam ṛcam punar
iti ca etāḥ japet apaḥ praviśya eteṣu karmasu
indrāviṣṇū namaskṛtya juhuyāt ājyam anvaham
sūktābhyām para etābhyām yā aicchet bhūtim ātmanaḥ
āsya daghnam vigāhya ambhaḥ prāt mukhaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ
sūktābhyām tisraḥ etābhyām upatiṣṭhet divākaram
an aśnatā tu japtavyam vṛṣṭi kāmena yatnataḥ
avāpnuyāt
yaḥ aribhiḥ pratipadyeta abhiśasyeta vā amṛṣā
upoṣya ekam tri rātram sajuhuyāt ājyam anvaham
indrāsoma iti sūktam tu japet ca etat śata avaram
kiṃcid dadyāt dvijebhyaḥ anteḥ tṛṇute sarva śātravān
yasya a lupyet vratam mohāt vrātyaiḥ vā a samspṛśet dvijaḥ
upoṣya ājyam ca juhuyāt tvam agne vrata pāḥ iti
prasaṃrājam iti tu etat japan īkṣet divākaram
udyantam upatiṣṭheta snātvā a snātvā dine dine
abhiyuktaḥ bhavet yaḥ tu vivadet vā api kenacid
nirjitya sa gaṇān śatrūn kṣipram vādam parājayet
śama gir agnibhiḥ ca eti prapadyet vāyu bhāskarau
agnim prathamatas stutvā mahat kṛcchrāt pramucyate
nahi iti yaḥ catuṣkeṇa snātvā vai prātar utthitaḥ
dvau māsau upatiṣṭheta satra āyati bhayāt svayam
tṛcam japtvā āyat iti etat snātvā abhyarcya puraṃdaram
prāpnuyāt mānasān kāmān sampūjya vasurociṣaḥ
ādyāni trīṇi sūktāni pañca ca agre bṛhan iti
ṣaḍ tathā antyāni sūktāni
prakṛtāni iti ca adhyāyam bhojanāt prāk paṭhet idam
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti mucyeta sarva kilbiṣaiḥ
prāk bhojanam idam brahma mānavānām mahā ṛṣiṇām
artha siddhiḥ parā bhavet
agninā iti āśvinam sūktam caturviṃśakam anvaham
japet prātar śuciḥ bhūtvā nāsatyā varcya suvrataḥ
sa prāpnuyāt parām ṛddhim draviṇam ca ūrjam eva ca
samidhā iti juhoti agnausūktena pratyṛcam ghṛtam
sa siddhim atulām prāpya samānām jīvate śatam
dvicatvāriṃśakena eha sūktena agha eti vajriṇam
sakhyam labdhvā mahā indreṇa sapatnān stṛṇute bahūn
prāśnīyāt japataḥ atra astipraśnam kṛtvā a pramāṇataḥ
tasmāt pūrvaāhṇikaḥ adhyāyaḥ smṛtaḥ ayam ripu nāśanaḥ
vāśam mahī iti ca japtvā prāpnoti ārogyam eva ca
duh svapna ghnīḥ parājaptvā prātar pāpaiḥ pramucyate
śamnaḥ bhava eti dvābhyām tu bhuktvā annam prayataḥ śuciḥ
hṛdayam pāṇinā a spṛṣṭvā a jyok jīvet agadaḥ sukhī
yatas ubhayam vijānīyāt tasyām diśi yata vrataḥ
śucau deśe agnim ādhāya juhuyāt indram arcya ca
yatas eti ājyam utpūtam ṣaḍbhiḥ gandhān nivedya ca
pāyasam dadhimantham vā apūpān vā api upahārayet
ahorātram upoṣya ekam tilān vā ghṛtam eva vā
uttvā mandantu iti snātaḥ hutvā śatrūn pramāpayet
baddhaḥ uvā api abaddhaḥ uvā avāgyataḥ prayataḥ japet
tya anu iti āditya daivatyam sadyas mucyeta bandhanāt
yat dyāvā iti japet nityam pragātham niyataḥ śuciḥ
sa kīrtim atulām prāpya sarvān kāmān samaśnute
tvam naḥ agne iti sūktena hutvā arcya agnim ghṛtena tu
pālitaḥ viśvatas dīptyā prāpnuyāt vahninā arayim
ātusūktena satatam dhanam yāvat puraṃdaram
prasamidh pāṇayetasmai dhanamyacchati vṛtrahā
kanyā vār iti sūktam tu satatam niyataḥ japet
tvagdoṣiṇīm tathā alomnīm kṣipram tasmāt pramocayet
yat adya kad ca eti uditi ravi stu tvā puraṃdaram
gṛṇan apohate ripram vaśyam vā akuruta jagat
yat vāc iti dvṛcena etya gaurī myaḥ arcati suvrataḥ
tasya na a saṃskṛtā vāṇī mukhāt uccarate kvacid
baṭ mahām iti dṛṣṭvā arkam upatiṣṭhet dvṛcam paṭhan vaṭ mahām
bruvan api anṛtām vāṇīm lipyate na anṛtenasaḥ
pūrṇe candramasi jyotsnām iyamyāḥ iti anusevayet
candra dṛṣṭiḥ tu animiṣaḥ varcasvī dṛṣṭimān bhavet
prajā ha eti japan snātvā an ayonim pratijāyate
mātā iti gām upaspṛśya japan gāḥ tu samaśnute
vacaḥ vidam iti tu etām japan vācam samaśnute
pāvamānam param hi etat navamam maṇḍalam japet
snātvā aśuciḥ śucau deśe sa pavitraḥ sa kāñcanaḥ e
svādiṣṭhayā iti gāyatrīḥ pāvamānīḥ japet dvijaḥ
pavitrāṇām pavitram tu pāvamānīḥ ṛcaḥ japet
prayataḥ apsu nimajya āśu sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
etāsām kīrtanam puṇyam smaraṇam dhāraṇam tathā
yāthāyathyena ca jñātvā brahma lokam samaśnute
eteṣām tu yathā uktānām guṇavat yat yat uttaram
kīrtanāt tu bhavet pūtaḥ smaraṇāt smarate param
dhāraṇāt brahma tām eti pūta ātmā avijita aindriyaḥ
yāthātathyena ca jñātvā brahmaṇaḥ vindate padam
śrāvayet devatā kṛtye brāhmaṇān bhuñjataḥ agratas
prīṇāti devatām tat ca samardhayati karma ca
pitrye pitrīn prīṇayanti śrāvitāḥ prayata ātmanā
kṛtvā a doṣān su mahataḥ api a peya ādīn prapīya ca
japtvā atarat samandīyam praviśya apaḥ tri ahāt śuciḥ
akṣayyam ca bhavet dattam pitṛbhyaḥ paramam madhu
yaḥ pāvamānīḥ adhyeti pūta ātmā a vijita aindriyaḥ
tasya kāmadughā bhūtvā upatiṣṭhanti dhenavaḥ
āyuḥ balam yaśaḥ vittam prajām kīrtim anāmayam
svādhyāya puṇyam atulam pūtaḥ prāpnoti ca akṣayam
aśaktaḥ tu japet yuktāḥ pavitrasya cayāḥ parāḥ
sapta ṛṣibhiḥ cayāḥ proktāḥ pavitrasya cayāḥ parāḥ
ṛcām dviṣaṣṭiḥ proktā iyam pavasva iti ṛṣi sattamaiḥ
sarva kalmaṣa nāśāya pāvanāya śivāya ca
svādiṣṭhayā iti sūktānām saptaṣaṣṭiḥ iha auditā
daśa uttarāṇi ṛcām ca eva pāvamānīḥ śatāni sa
etat juhvan japan ca eva ghoram mṛtyu bhayam jayet
vyādhibhyaḥ parimokṣam ca labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ
pratigṛhya a pratigrāhyam bhuktvā ca annam vigarhitam
japan taratsamandīyam praviśya apaḥ tri ahāt śuciḥ
pāvamānam param hi etat rapasām apanodanam
prāṇān āyamya ca dhyāyet ante devān pitṝn ṛṣīn
upoṣya ājyam ca juhuyāt agnim somam ca pūjayet
sarasvatīm ca arcayeta payaḥ ambu madhu sarpiṣā
ādhyātmikam pavitram te sūktam japtvā āplutaḥ śuciḥ
gatim iṣṭām avāpnoti vindate ca eha vṛddayaḥ
nāśayet brahmahatyām vaivasiṣṭha vacanam yathā not in bhat
nānā namiti sūktāni anta kāle japet sakṛt
japtvā ca eva param sthānam amṛta tvam ca gacchati
āpohiṣṭhā eti niyataḥ prayuñjīta sadā dvijaḥ
snāna artham śuddhi kāmaḥ tu japeta atris samāhitaḥ
apsu ca eva nimajjitvā tris paṭhet su samāhitaḥ
brahmahātu kapālena khaṭvā aaṅgī cīra saṃvṛtaḥ
caret dvādaśa varṣāṇi sva karma parikīrtayan
a japan manasā eva etat āpohiṣṭhā iti saṃsmaret
ūrdhvam tu pañcamāt varṣāt japet eva sahasraśas
aparaḥ tu tri sāhasraḥ japaḥ syāt pratyaham sadā
pūrṇe tu dvādaśe varṣe brahma hā vipramucyate
sametya brāhmaṇāḥ brūyuḥ athatam carita vratam
acaritam bhavet kiṃcid mithyā vādī pateḥ punar
daśa avarān daśa parān hanyāḥ tvam anṛtam vadan
om bho iti vadet vipraiḥ anujñātaḥ śuciḥ japet
sthālīpākam cakurvīta saḥ agnaye vrata cāriṇe
evam samucyate pāpāt sāvitrīm pratipadya ca
brahma hāsa purā śakraḥ tvāṣṭram hatvā tu ṛṣim prabham
sindhudvīpaḥ tam etābhiḥ abhiṣicya vyamocayat
brahma svam ca guroḥ dravyam steyam kṛtvā ajapan imāḥ
anena eva vidhānena ṣaḍbhiḥ varṣaiḥ pramucyate
brahma hā ca surāpaḥ ca niyamena japan imāḥ
anena eva aupacāreṇa brahma ghnā evam ucyate
brāhmaṇasya ruṣā udyamya japet etān pātya ca
tri aham nipātya upavaset eka aham avagūrya ca
śoṇitam tu prahāreṇa autpādyasa kathaṃcana
tri rātram eva upavaset japet etāḥ
prātar utthāya satatam kuryāt mārjanam ātmanaḥ
rātrau kṛtasya pāpasya a vijñātasya niṣkṛtiḥ
sāyam ca nityam etābhiḥ kuryāt mārjanam ātmanaḥ
divā kṛtasya pāpasya a vijñātasya niṣkṛtiḥ
upatiṣṭheta rājānam yamam sūktena vai dvijaḥ
sthālīpākam cakurvīta pakṣayoḥ yama daivatam
aṣṭamyām ca caturdaśyām yajeta haviṣā yamam
pareyivāṃsam iti etat sūktam atra prayojayet
purā āyuṣaḥ pramīyeta na jātu sa kathaṃcana
prīyate asya yamaḥ rājā a smṛtim ca ante prayacchati
dharmarājāya svāhā iti mantra ante juhuyāt haviḥ
vaiśākhyām paurṇamāsyām tu karma nityam prayojayet
anaye parvasu snātvā ayaḥ pradadyāt tila udakam
yamāya sagaṇāya eva tat bhayam na savindati
mṛtyum eva prapadyeta param mṛtyo japan dvijaḥ
naktabhojī mita āhāraḥ parisaṃvatsaram sadā
na enam purā āyuṣaḥ mṛtyuḥ nayate sa suta prajam
phala āhāraḥ jayet mṛtyum tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ mita aśanaḥ
ṣaṣṭhe kāle tu bhuñjīta phalam mūlam atha api vā
sthāna āsanābhyām viharet udake śiśire vaset
grīṣme pañcatapāḥ tu syāt varṣāsu abhra avakāśakaḥ
evam yuktaḥ jayet mṛtyum rogebhyaḥ ca pramucyate
bhrātuḥ bhāryām aputrasya santāna artham mṛte patau
devaraḥ anvārurukṣantīm udīrṣva eti nivartayet
ṛtu kāle tu samprāpte ghṛta abhyaktaḥ atha vāgyataḥ
ekam utpādayet putram na dvitīyam kathaṃcana
daśa akṣaram tu śānti artham bhadram na eti saṃsmaret
nityam japet śuciḥ bhūtvā mānasam vindate sukham
phala āhāraḥ bhavet māsam māsam ca apaḥ pibet tatas
vāyubhakṣaḥ bhavet māsam japan etat sahasraśas
manasā eva asya sidhyanti sarve kāmāḥ samīhitāḥ
divyān paśyati gandharvān siddhān paśyati cāraṇān
antardhānam vrajati asmāt lokāt ākāśa gaḥ bhavet
dūrāt paśyati dūrāt ca śṛṇoti parameṣṭhi vat
pra deva traiti niyataḥ japeta maru dhanvasu
prāṇa antike bhaye prāpte kṣipram ambhaḥ sa vindati
vaibhītakān tu trīn akṣān gandhaiḥ samabhivāsayet
puṣpaiḥ avakiret ca enān sthāpayitvā a vihāyasi
saṃhatya pādau tām rātrīm tiṣṭhan nakṣa stutim japet
prāvepām āṛcam tu etām manasā eva japet niśi
vyuṣṭāyām udite sūrye japan nādevanam vrajet
etām eva japet nityam jayati anyaiḥ na jīyate
yam eva jetum iccheta spṛṣṭvā mūrdhanitam japet
sūkta śeṣam jayati anyān jīyate na sa kenacid
abudhram uṣāsānaktā iti ete svastyayane japet
namaḥ mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣasā eti nityaśas
asya eva ca uttama ṛge kāyayā enobhyaḥ pramucyate
tayā ājyam juhuyāt nityam enobhyaḥ vipramucyate
divaspari iti sūktam tu japen śraddhā samanvitaḥ
sarvatra labhate śraddhām śraddhā kāmaḥ samāhitaḥ
mā pragāma eti ca japet samūḍhaḥ gahane pathi
svastimān eti panthānam vindate ca param sukham
kṣīṇa āyuḥ iti manyeta yam kaṃcid suhṛdam priyam
yat te iyam amiti snātaḥ tasya mūrdhānam ālabhet
sahasra kṛtvas pañca aham japet āyuḥ labhetasaḥ
ghṛtena sindhudvīpasya sūktena enam pralepayet
saṃviśan śayane nityam etam mantram japet avai
putrān bhāryām priyam ca anyam ātmānam saṃspṛśet tatas
jīva āvṛttim prayuñjīta nityam etām ghṛtena tu
śrotāṃsi abhyajya sarvāṇi sukhībhavati vijvaraḥ
idam itthā iti mantraḥ ayam sahasrasaniḥ ucyate
ardha māsam haviṣya annam ardha māsam payaḥ pibet
upoṣya ca a parampakṣam araṇye sthaṇḍile śucau
audumbara aidhmam prajvālya juhuyāt pāvake ghṛtam
sruc sruvau camasaḥ ca eva sarvam audumbaram bhavet
hutvā āhuti sahasram tu tena kāmena yujyate
amogham eva karma etat jānīyāt siddhim eva tu
vyartham api ardham eva etat phalasya asya prayacchati
catuṣpathe ca anna kāmaḥ āditya abhimukhaḥ ghṛtam
juhuyāt dhana kāmaḥ tu sahasram bhojayet dvijān
paśu kāmaḥ japet goṣṭhe juhuyāt vā api upoṣitaḥ
vidhinā anena niyataḥ sahasram vindate paśūn
loha lohita hemānām kārayet trivṛtam maṇim
sahasram samidhām ca eva sampāta
kṛtvā sahasra sampātam śirasā ādhārayet tutam
pāṇinau āśuciḥ bhūtvā sahasra anucaraḥ bhavet
parāvataḥ svastyayanam snātakasya vidhīyate
svarga kāmaḥ catam nityam japeta niyata vrataḥ
bṛhaspate prathamam iti nityam jñāna stutim japet
jñānavān bhavati śrīmān anantām vindate śriyam
alakṣmī nāśana artham tu payaḥ bhakṣaḥ bhavet dvijaḥ
vayaḥ suparṇāḥ iti etām japan vaivindate śriyam
tamasā prāvṛtaḥ yaḥ tumanyeta ātmānam ātmani
a śriyāvā api atha āviṣṭaḥ japan etām pramucyate
akṣiṇī prātar utthāya vimṛjīta etayā sadā
cakṣuṣmān bhavati śrīmān alakṣmīm ca prabādhate
natamvidā atha eti etām tu japan vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
vihāya kalmaṣam sarvam brahma abhyeti sanātanam
anayā a parvasu snātvā ayaḥ pradadyāt tila odakam
yamāya sagaṇāya eva tat bhayam na savindati
yaḥ te manyo iti sadā sapatna ghne tvime japet
ghṛtena abhihutam dvābhyām dhārayet āyasam maṇim
juhuyāt āyasam śaṅkum ābhyām eva caturdaśīm
khādira aidhma samiddhe agnau sapatnān pratibādhate
yathā ahi paramam brahma guhyam pāvanam adbhutam
tathā a saṃvananam hṛdyam na hi asmāt vidyate param
upoṣya dvādaśa ahāni japan etam ṛṣim sadā
tad manāḥ prayataḥ sasyāt tris ahnaḥ abhyupayan apaḥ
ante tu dvādaśa ahasya śucau deśe samāhitaḥ
puṃsaḥpratikṛtim kuryāt bhūmau pāṃsu mayīm tathā
tasya ā hṛdaya deśam tu samākramya japet ṛṣim
amogham karma jānīyāt ahorātre gate sati
tri aheṇa dhaninām vaiśyam catur rātreṇa kṣatriyam
rājānam pañca rātreṇa ṣaṣ rātreṇa dvijauttamam
tapasvinam sapta rātrāt jayet bhuñjīta ca evatam
api vā upoṣitaḥ snātaḥ japet etat sadā sthitaḥ
yaḥ icchet ātmanaḥ kartum hīnam tu parivarjayet
sahasra sampāta hutam bilvānām cūrṇam āvayet
udapāna ivaśam netum tam janam kṣipram ānayet
mātari ātmani putreṣu pitṛ bhrātṛ suhṛtsu ca
hṛdyam etat prayujñīta śirasā ādhārayet gurum
sumitram tu pariṣvajya mūrdhani āghrāya ca ātmajam
hṛdyam etat prayuñjīta śānti arthāya sukhāya ca
a saṃsiddhe saṃvanane pāṃsu pratikṛtim pathi
prajvālya juhuyāt agnim ghṛtena brāhmaṇaḥ yadi
kṣatriyasya tu tailena sārṣapeṇa viśām api
āyasīm vā a pratikṛtim agni madhye nidhāpayet
tām ca prajvalitām matvā juhuyāt tad manāḥ śuciḥ
ugreṇa manasā āhanyāt kruddhaḥ ca juhuyāt ghṛtam
yathā yathā prajvalite hūyate jātavedasi
dīptā pratikṛti vipraḥ tathā āsava śameṣyati
śmaśāna dagdha pāṃsūnām kuryāt vedim vilakṣaṇām
ardha rātre sthite taile sārṣapa mlavaṇa anvitam
tatra śara mayam kuryāt prastaram pratilomataḥ
triṣu śaṅkuṣu ca āsīnaḥ juhuyāt ugra darśanaḥ
mukta keśaḥ vadham prepsuḥ acireṇa prasādhayet
athavā abhicaret evam juhuyāt ātma śoṇitam
vaśam nayati rājānam kṣipram janapadam puram
puṣṭi karma apikartavyam hṛdyena uktam yatas ātmanā
anāgasina kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ vadha samyutam
sarūpa vatsāyāḥ ca goḥ payasā āsādhayet carum
sahasra sampāta hutam pāyayet vatsam agrajam
sahasra anucaraḥ vatsaḥ sasyāt rāgaiḥ vivarjitaḥ
gāḥ ca eva pāyayet tāḥ ca bhavanti vigata jvarāḥ
putrān ca prāśayet nityam priyān anyān ca sat janān
nirāmayāḥ ca snigdhāḥ ca bhavanti vigata jvarāḥ
striyam ced abhimanyeta tasyāḥ saṃvananam mahat
vrīhīṇām nakha bhinnānām taṇḍulān sūkṣma cūrṇitān
sahasra sampāta hutān svedayet kuśalaḥ agninā
tena pratikṛtim kuryāt tām dhyātvā manasā astriyam
aktām sarṣapa tailena juhuyāt aṅgaśas ca tām
pādau prathamatas chindyāt phaṭ iti agnau nidhāpayet
atha jaṅghe jānu ni ca ūru bāhu utatas śiraḥ
chittvā a hṛdaya deśam tu hṛdaye sve niveśayet
japan etam ṛṣim vipraḥ strī vaśam sā adhigacchati
na etad parigṛhītāsu na sādhvīṣu kathaṃcana
na dharma vrata śīlāsu kurvīta dvijasattamaḥ
kāmam parigṛhīta asu hīna varṇa asu yaḥ caret
patim asya a guṇīkuryāt pūrvam paścāt tu tām striyam
bhuktvā ava apāyasam sadyas chardayitvā nidhāpayet
tat cūrṇam kṛṣṇajāyā yaideyam saṃvananam smṛtam
mahāvṛkṣa phalāni evam ayugmāni abhimantrayet
teṣām yugmāni bhuñjīta svayam ardhāni śeṣayet
tāni dadyāt yam icchet tu vaśīkartum japan ṛṣim
suhṛd bhūtvā asuhṛd yasya deyam saṃvananam smṛtam
eka ekam abhirūpam tu hṛdya sūkta ādi atas punar
karmāṇi tu abhirūpāṇi kuryāt yaḥ tu yathā icchati
parāka dāsasya vidhim hṛdyena uktam viduḥ budhāḥ
strīṇām saṃvananam ca etat puṃsām api vidhīyate
dveṣyam tu jñātinām eva japet ca eva sadā āyudhi
khādiram kārayet śaṅkum hṛditam samniveśayet
kṛtvā a pratikṛtim pūrvam pāṃsubhiḥ vā athavā atuṣaiḥ
iṣum api anumantrya eva saṃgrāmam samprakalpayet
ripu ghnam etat jānīyāt prayuktam aparājitam
parāka dāsa dveṣya artham hṛdyam saṃvananam smṛtam
cintayan manasā api ete sūkte siddhim niyacchati
sūryāyai bhāva vṛttam tu śrāvayet kanyakām pitā
anurūpam su sadṛśam bhartāram tena vindati
imām iti japet kanyā nābhim ālabhya nityaśas
evam eva japet bhartā atatas dīrgha āyuṣau tutau
snāpayet abhirūpaiḥ ca bhrātā kanyām pitā api vā
daśa putravatī bhavet na ca bhartrā viyujyate
saṃ rājñī iti japet mūrdhni kanyām ālabhya nityaśas
śvaśrū śvaśura devaraiḥ na nāndrā ca api pūjyate
indrāṇyā akṛta saṃvādam snāne sūktam prayojayet
jala puṣpa utkara yute citra kumbha samāvṛte
kartavya ūatra tathā yāgaḥ soma gandharva vahninām
bhagāya apsarasām ca eva yakṣa adhipataye api ca
indrāṇī aideva patnī nāmrati pradyumnayoḥ tathā
nadī salika sampūrṇaiḥ pañcagavya samāvṛtaiḥ
hutvā agnim snāpayet kanyām sthitām deśe tu dakṣiṇe
sampāta abhihutam kṛtvā sarva oṣadhi samanvitam
abhimantrya hi sūkta ante navabhiḥ stu vi hi iti vai
stheyābhiḥ adbhiḥ pūrṇena abhiṣiñcet upoṣitām
yaḥ pati ghnyaḥ striyaḥ tanvaḥ śāmyante tāḥ tu anena vai
snāpayet āhanasyābhiḥ vidyāt yām vipravrājinīm
sūktāt upoddharet enam nasā īśa iti tud vṛcam
upadiṣṭaḥ ayam ekeṣām puṃsaḥ karmaṇi pauruṣe
rakṣaḥ haṇam vājinam iti etat rakṣaḥ haṇam japet
agnim prajvālya ca etena upatiṣṭheta nityaśas
ājya āhutīḥ ca juhuyāt tena rakṣāṃsi bādhate
etat rakṣaḥ haṇam śāntiḥ paramā eṣā prakīrtitā
haviṣpāntīyam iti etat sūktam atra prayojayet
garhita anna agha yoge ca haviṣpāntīyam abhyaset
pavitram paramam hi etat dhyātavyam ca abhīkṣṇaśas
āditye dṛṣṭim āsthāya ṣaṣ māsān niyataḥ abhyaset
deva yānam sa panthānam paśyati āditya maṇḍale
vidyā vaiśvānarī ca asya sva kāya sthā prakāśate
haviṣpāntīyam abhyasya sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
indram tava eti sūktam tu japet śatru nibarhaṇam
pavitrāṇām pavitram tu guhyam pāvanam adbhutam
śukla pakṣe śubhe vāre su nakṣatre su gocare
dvādaśyām putra kāmāya carum kurvīta avaiṣṇavam
dampatyoḥ upavāsaḥ syāt ekādaśyām sula ālaye
ṛgbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ samyak arcayitvā janārdanam
carum puruṣasūktena śrapayet putra kāmyayā
prāpnuyāt vaiṣṇavam putram acirāt santati kṣamam
dvādaśa dvādaśīḥ samyak payasā nirvapet carum
yaḥ karoti sahasram syāt yāti viṣṇoḥ parampadam
hutvā agnim vidhivat samyak ṛgbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ budhaḥ
kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhūtvā stavam tābhiḥ prayojayet
keśavam mārgaśīrṣa itu pauṣe nārāyaṇam smṛtam
mādhavam māgha māse tu govindam phālgune tathā
caitre ca eva tathā viṣṇum vaiśākhe madhusūdanam
jyeṣṭhe trivikramam vidyāt āṣāḍhe vāmanam viduḥ
śrāvaṇe śrīdharam vidyāt hṛṣīkeśam tatas pare
āśvine padmanābham tudāmodaram ca kārttike
dvādaśa etāni nāmāni ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ abravīt muniḥ
pūjayet māsa nāmabhiḥ sarvān kāmān samaśnute
āyuṣmantam sutam sūte yaśaḥ medhā samanvitam
dhanavantam prajāvantam dhārmikam sāttvikam tathā
samidhaḥ aśvattha vṛkṣasya hutvā agnim juhuyāt punar
upasthānam hutāśasya dhyātvā arcya madhusūdanam
haviḥ hoam tatas kuryāt pratyṛcam vāgyataḥ śuciḥ
sūktena juhuyāt ājyam ādau ante ca pūrvavat
haviḥ śeṣam namaskṛtvā nārī nārāyaṇam patim
bhakṣayitvā haviḥ śeṣam labdha āśīḥ saṃviśet kṣapām
tatas tu karma kṛtvā idam kartavyam dvijatarpaṇam
dvitīyām striyām nivarteta yāvat garbham na vindati
aputrām ṛtaputrau ā yāca kanyām prasūyate
kṣipram sā janayet putram ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ yathā abravīt
arcām sampravakṣyāmi viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ
yat kṛtvā munayaḥ sarve brahma nirvāṇam āpnuyuḥ
apsu agnau hṛdaye sūrye sthaṇḍile pratimāsu ca
ṣaṭsu eteṣu hareḥ samyak arcanam munibhiḥ smṛtam
agnau kriyāvatām devaḥ dividevaḥ manīṣiṇām
pratimāsu alpabuddhīnām yoginām hṛdaye hariḥ
āpaḥ hi āyatanam tasya tasmāt tāsu sadā hariḥ
tasya sarva gata tvāt ca sthaṇḍile bhāvitaātmanām
dadyāt puruṣasūktena ayaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva vā
arcitam syāt jagat idam tena sarvam cara acaram
ānuṣṭubhasya sūktasya triṣṭubh antasya devatā
puruṣaḥ yaḥ jagat bījam ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
nārāyaṇa mahā bāho śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ prabho
vakṣye puruṣasūktasya vidhānam tu arcanam prati
agni kāryam japa vidhim stotram ca eva sat ātmakam
snātvā yathā ukta vidhinā prānmukhaḥ śuddha mānasaḥ
prathamām vinyaset vāme dvitīyām dakṣiṇe kare
tṛtīyām vāma pāde tu caturthīm dakṣiṇe nyaset
pañcamī vāma jānu ni ṣaṣṭhim vai dakṣiṇe nyaset
saptamīm vāma kaṭyām tu aṣṭamīm dakṣiṇe kaṭau
navamīm nābhi madhye tu daśamīm hṛdaye nyaset
ekādaśīm kaṇṭha deśe dvādaśīm vāma bāhuke
trayodaśīm dakṣiṇe ca āsye ca eva caturdaśīm
akṣṇoḥ pañcadaśīm ca eva ṣoḍaśīm mūrdhni vinyaset
evam nyāsa vidhim kṛtvā paścāt pūjām samārabhet
yathādehe tathādeve nyāsam kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
ādyayā āvāhayet devam ṛcātupuruṣa auttamam
dvitīyayā āsanam dadyāt pādyam ca eva tṛtīyayā
arghyam caturthyā dātavyam pañcamyā ācamanīyakam
ṣaṣṭhyā snānam prakurvīta saptamyā vastram eva ca
yajñaupavītam aṣṭamyā anavamyā ca anulepanam
puṣpam daśamyā ādātavyam ekādaśyā tu dhūpakam
dvādaśyā dīpakam dadyāt trayodaśyā nivedanam
caturdaśyā a namaskāram pañcadaśyā a pradakṣiṇam
snāne vastre ca naivedye dadyāt ācamanīyakam
dakṣiṇām tu yathāśaktyā ṣoḍaśyā tu pradāpayet
tatas pradakṣiṇām kṛtvā japam kuryāt samāhitaḥ
yathāśakti japitvā atu sūktam tasya nivedayet
devasya dakṣiṇe pārśve kuṇḍam sthaṇḍilam eva vā
kārayet prathamena eva dvitīyena tu prokṣaṇam
tṛtīyena agnim ādadhyāt caturthena samindhanam
pañcamena ājya śrapaṇam caroḥ ca śrapaṇam tathā
ṣaṣṭhena eva agnim adhye tu kalpayet padmam āsanam
cintayet devadeva īśam kāla anala sama prabham
tatas gandham ca puṣpam ca dhūpa dīpa nivedanam
anujñāpya tatas kuryāt saptamī ādi yathākramam
samidhaḥ tāvatīḥ pūrvam juhuyāt abhidhāritāḥ
tatas ghṛtena juhuyāt caruṇā ca tatas punar
evam hutvā tatas ca eva anujñāpya yathākramam
agneḥ bhagavataḥ tasya samīpe stotram uccaret
jitam te puṇḍarīka akṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana
namaḥ te astu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja
devānām dānavānām ca sāmānyam adhidaivatam
sarvadā ācaraṇa dvandvam vrajāmi śaraṇam tava
ekaḥ tvam asi lokasya a sraṣṭā a saṃhārakaḥ tathā
avyaktaḥ ca anumantā ca guṇa māyā samāvṛtaḥ
saṃsāra sāgaram ghoram anantam kleśa bhājanam
tvām eva śaraṇam prāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ
nate rūpam na ca ākāraḥ na āyudha ani na ca āspadam
tathā api puruṣa ākāraḥ bhaktānām tvam prakāśase
na eva kiṃcid parokṣam te pratyakṣaḥ asi na kasyacid
na eva kiṃcid asādhyam tena ca sādhyaḥ asi kasyacid
kāryāṇām kāraṇam pūrvam vacasām vāyam uttamam
yoginām paramā aiddhiḥ paramam te padam viduḥ
aham bhītaḥ asmi deva īśa saṃsāre asmin mahā bhaye
trā himām puṇḍarīka akṣana jāne paramam padam
kāleṣu api ca sarveṣu diṣku sarvāṣu ca acyuta
śarīre ca gataḥ ca asi vartate me mahat bhayam
tvad pāda kamalāt anyat name janma antareṣu api
vijñānam yat idam prāpya yat idam sthānam arjitam
janma antare api me devam ābhūt asya parikṣayaḥ
durgatau api jātavya tvad gataḥ me manorathaḥ
yadi nāśam na vindeta tāvatā asmi kṛtī sadā
kāmaye viṣṇu pādau tu sarva janmasu kevalam
puruṣasya hareḥ sūktam svargyam dhanyam yaśaskaram
ātma jñānam idam puṇyam yoga jñānam idam param
phala āhāraḥ bhavet māsam paśyati ātmānam ātmani
phalāni bhuktvā upavaset māsam adbhiḥ ca vartayet
araṇye nivaset nityam japan etam ṛṣim sadā
tris triṣavaṇa kāleṣu snāyāt apsu samāhitaḥ
ādityam upatiṣṭheta sūktena anena nityaśas
ājya āhutoḥ anena eva hutvā etam cintayet ṛṣim
ūrdhvam māsāt phala āhāraḥ tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ jayet divam
tad bhaktaḥ tad manāḥ yuktaḥ daśa varṣāṇi an anya bhāj
sākṣāt paśyati tam devam nārāyaṇam anāmayam
grāhyam atyanta yatnena sraṣṭāram jagataḥ avyayam
gṛhastha dharme varteta nyāya klṛptaḥ śuci vrataḥ
etam devam cintayeta nārāyaṇam anāmayam
samprasupta iṣu bhūta iṣu yogam yuñjīta yoga vid
ṛju āsīnaḥ same deśe nivāte śabda varjite
savyam pādam dakṣiṇasya jānu niśleṣayet tatas
saṃhṛtya dakṣiṇam pādam savye jānuniyacchati
brahma añjali kṛtaḥ svasthaḥ yoga sammīlita īkṣaṇaḥ
om iti uktvā svam hṛdayam cintayet aviśaṅkitaḥ
tatra ātmānam samādadhyāt indriyāṇi manaḥ tathā
na ced budhyeta kiṃca anyat na paśyet śṛṇuyāt na ca
namanasya id yadā yogam tadā aprāptaḥ saḥ ucyate
hṛdyam etam ṛṣim abhyasyet paśyan iva ayathāśruti
prāṇān āyamya ca āsīnaḥ yāvat tam cintayet ṛṣim
ucchvasiṣyan adhas nābhi gamayitvā amanaḥ tathā
ucchvaset evam asakṛt tad manā yogam unnayet
evam hi yuñjan sāmānyam na paśyet śṛṇuyāt na ca
tadā aśanaiḥ nayet cetaḥ hṛdayāt ūrdhvam eva tu
sa mautu jatrū ca āsyam ca nāsikā nayane bhruvau
bhruvoḥ madhye param sthānam tatra etat dhārayet sthiram
lalāṭa deśe dhārya atha mūrdhānam gamayet tatas
ucchvasan ca yathākālam nābhim gatvā ucchvaset punar
etat param sthānam uktam brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
evam yuktaḥ mahātmānam ātmānam pratipadyate
yadi syāt sukṛtī śuddhaḥ yadi vā a pāpa kṛttamaḥ
upalabhya param brahma gatim jñātvā bhavet śuciḥ
sarva pāpa anubaddhaḥ ced buddhvā etat prayataḥ japet
apijijñāsanāt eva gaccheta paramām gatim
dhāraṇā tu pṛthak kāryā adharmeṇa anena nityaśas
āditye agnau candramasi vṛkṣa agreṣu ca dhārayet
parvata agre samudra iva ayatra vā api manorame
na tu eva viṣayān prāpya dhārayīta kathaṃcana
bahu atra duhkham jānīyāt pradhvaṃse dhāraṇā kṛte
dhārmikāṇām kule śuddhe yoga bhraṣṭaḥ abhijāyate
mūrdhni brahma yadā āvindet tam eva ṛṣi sattamam
tadā mūrdhnaḥ param jyotiḥ nakṣatra patham unnayet
yogī yoga īśvaram prāpya nirdvandvaḥ parama ātma vid
sarvatra eva ātmanā ātmānam paśyet ṛṣi parāyaṇaḥ
japet ca eva sadā snātaḥ pavitram idam uttamam
api pātaka samyuktaḥ kālena sukṛtī bhavet
tapaḥ parāyaṇaḥ nityam satya vāc anasūyakaḥ
japan etam ṛṣim vipraḥ kālena savanībhavet
yena yena ca kāmena japet imam ṛṣim sadā
sa sa kāmaḥ samṛddhaḥ syāt śraddadhānasya kurvataḥ
homam vā api athavā ajāpyam upahāram atha u carum
kurvīta yena kāmena tad siddhim avadhārayet
jñāti śraiṣṭhyam mahat vittam yaśaḥ loke parām gatim
pāpena vipramokṣaḥ tu tad siddhim avadhārayet
jñāna gamyam param sūkṣmam vyāpya sarvam avasthitam
grāhyam atyanta yatnena brahma abhyeti sanātanam
sahasra śīrṣā iti sūktam sarva kāma phala pradam
vedagarbha śarīreṇa sa vainārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
brahma aindu rudra parjanya atra sūkte vyavasthitāḥ
atrastham etat draṣṭavyam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
an āsādayāmaḥ api bhaktim na parihāpayet
bhakta anukampī bhagavān śrūyate puruṣa auttamaḥ
pūjā artham tasya devasya vanyān svayam upārjitān
āraṇyaka vidhānena nirvapet pratyaham carum
nārāyaṇāya svāhā iti mantra ante juhuyāt haviḥ
ā sahasrāt tatas cakṣuḥ divyam hotuḥ dadāti saḥ
api vā caru sahasram tantreṇa ekena nirvapet
yāvantaḥ vā api śakyante ahnā sarvān samāpayet
sahasrasya īpsitānām ca kāmānām labhate phalam
puruṣa āyuḥ samāyuktaḥ siddhaḥ vā api caret mahīm
dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartī nārāyaṇaḥ sarasija āsana samniviṣṭaḥ
keyūravān makara kuṇḍalavān kirīṭī hārī hiraṇmaya vapuḥ dhṛta śaṅkha cakraḥ
etat tuyaḥ paṭhati kevalam eva sūktam nārāyaṇasya caraṇau abhivandya vandyau
pāṭhena tena paramena sanātanasya sthānam jarā maraṇa varjitam eti viṣṇoḥ
haviṣā agnau jale puṣpaiḥ dhyānena hṛdaya harim
bilva patram śamī patram patram bhṛṅgārakasya ca
yat na upapadyate kiṃcid tam dhyāyet manasā eva tu
sampadyate prasādāt tu devadevasya cakriṇaḥ
patraiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ ca toyaiḥ a krīta labdhaiḥ śca sadā eva satsu
bhaktyā eka labhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyā ekimartham kriyate na yatnaḥ
iti evam uktaḥ puruṣasya viṣṇoḥ arcā vidhiḥ viṣṇu kumāra nāmnā
muktyā eka mārga pratibodhanāya dṛṣṭvā vidhānam tu iha nārada uktam
yāḥ oṣadhīḥ svastyayanam japeta nitya vrataḥ
oṣadhīḥ ca jayet nityam ṣaṭ māsān eva nityaśas
iṣṭvā śarad vairudram oṣadhīḥ ca yajet tathā
tasya āmayān na bhavanti tathā jīrṇāni yāni ca
kriyām tu sapta rātreṇa sapta kṛtvas abhyaset tatas
prapadyeta oṣadhīm vipraḥ sūktam etat japan sadā
dviṣat kṣetrāt iha āyadhvam iti vijñāpayeta ca
sva kṣetrevaruṇam iṣṭvā vindate dviṣa doṣadhīḥ
vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ yata āhāraḥ prapadyeta bṛhaspatim
pāyasena aupahāreṇa homena ca samanvitaḥ
bṛhaspate pati iti etat vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ prayojayet
parjanyam ca namaskṛtvā vṛṣṭim vindati śobhanām
yam eva deśam gaccheta śatrum vā api anumantritaḥ
na a jitvā vinivarteta param hi brahmaṇaḥ balam
sarva kāmaiḥ japet etat sarva kāma samṛddhaye
saṃgrāmam abhyudyatāya rājñe ca etat prayojayet
sarvān vijayate śatrūn na parājīyate paraiḥ
pathi svastyayanam ca etat taskarebhyaḥ caran pathi
bhūta auraga piśācebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ parirakṣati
bhūtāṃśam kāśyapam sūktam prajā kāmaḥ śuciḥ japan
anurūpām prajām āśu labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ
sthālīpākena nāsatyau aśvinau tu jayet dvijaḥ
anena eva tu sūktena hutvā aśvān anumantrayet
pāyasam kṛsaram māṃsam odanam dadhi saktukān
kulmāṣān ca karambhān ca phalāni vividhāni ca
citram mātryam śubhān gandhān anna pānāni yāni ca
bhakṣyam bhojyam ca peyam ca samāhṛtya oditeravau
bhūtāṃśam abhyaset tāvat yāvat astamita uraviḥ
ardharātre tu atikrānte tatas aśvibhyām nivedayet
dīrgha āyuṣam surūpam ca labhet putram suvarcasam
rūpavān ca bhavet nityam bhūtān śamyaḥ abhyaset sadā
sārvakāmim iti etam ṛṣim vidyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
na vāu devāḥ iti etat japeta niyata vrataḥ
annam vindati sarvatra yatra yatra upatiṣhati
pāpmā aupahatam ātmānam yomani eta vicakṣaṇaḥ
sa japet niyataḥ bhūtvā laghum anyeta pāpmanā
vācam prapadyet vāc kāmaḥ juhvat āśu japan imāḥ
aham rudrebhiḥ iti etat vāgmī bhavati pūjitaḥ
natam iti aṣṭakam sūktam vaiśvadevam japan muniḥ
kṛtsnam tu kalmaṣam hatvā viśvaiḥ devaiḥ saha āsate
rātrīm prapadyeta sadā aśuciḥ cīrṇa vrataḥ niśi
yaḥ kāmayeta na punar jāyeyam iti yoniṣu
sahasra kṛtvas manasā japet rātrī iti rātrisu
sthālīpākena rātrīm ca yajeta ahar ahar niśi
tanmanāḥ niśica āsīnaḥ tiṣṭhet ahani dhārmikaḥ
ūrdhvam saṃvatsarāt ca eva carum payasi saṃskṛtam
sahasra kṛtvas tu etena divā homaḥ vidhīyate
juhuyāt niśi pūrvasmin bhāge rātri samāhitaḥ
divā ca āvaśyakam kāryam chāyāyām aṃśu tejasā
iti prayataḥ ātmavān sūktam tu manasā japet
saṃvatsare tṛtīye tu sarpiṣā sādhayet carum
atha asya vara dā devī rātriḥ bhavati śarvarī
vijñāpayati tām devīm vara dām svayam āgatām
saṃvatsara ṛtau māsi divase asmin kṣaṇe api vā
prayāṇa kālaḥ bhavitā atava vatsā eti vatsalā
rātrīsūktam japan eva tam kālam pratipadyate
na yonim punar āyāti sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
mama agne varcaḥ iti etat sarva kāmaiḥ japet dvijaḥ
juhvat ājyam anena eva sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
yām kalpayanti iti sadā japeta niyata vrataḥ
na enam kṛtyāni hiṃsanti kruddha abhicaritāni ca
yam maṅgirasa kalpaiḥ tu tad vidaḥ abhicaranti saḥ
pratyaṅgirasa kalpena sarvān tān pratibādhate
prati aṅgirasa vidvān tu nar iṣyeta kadācana
na enam kṛtyāni hiṃsanti jñāta ajñātāni vā kvacid
a jānatā a jānatā vā a kruddhena a marṣitena vā
ākruṣṭam vā duruktam vā ana ena uliṇ pati tad vidam
evam eva japet nityam ṛṣim svastyayanāya vai
sarvaprāyaścittam etat abhāṣata ṛṣiḥ svayam
sthāvarāṇām niveśe tu nagarāṇām tathā eva ca
grāmāṇām ca gṛhāṇām ca japet imam ṛṣim sadā
jātarūpa mayam vidvān kārayet trivṛtam maṇim
sahasra sampāta hutam ṛṣiṇā atenatam tatas
pratimuñceta śirasi grīvāyām athavā urasi
na enam kṛtyāni hiṃsanti jñāta ajñātāni yāni ca
anena eva tu sūktena rājñām ca sama lohitam
kārayeta maṇim vidvān tāvat eva anumantraṇam
saṃgrāma iṣu dhvaja agrāṇi vāditrāṇi anumantrayet
āsanānica śayyā āśca yānāni vividhānica
tasya abhicarataḥ sākṣāt āṅgirasa ṛṣeḥ svayam
pratyaṅgirasa kalpena sarvam tat pratibādhate
amānuṣīḥ abhicaret kṛtyāsu uktam japan idam
mucyate sarvatas aniṣṭāt kim punar mānuṣāt bhayam
tapasvī niyata udāntaḥ prayoktā ced bhavet ṛṣiḥ
ātmā tapaḥ hi su mahat balam
āyuṣyam āyuḥ varcasyam sūktam dākṣāyaṇam mahat
alaṃkāram hiraṇyam vā a prāpya dākṣāyaṇam japet
prāptam ca śriyam ādatte bahu ca annam samaśnute
na asat āsīt iti japet juhuyāt yoga tatparaḥ
prajāpateḥ tu sā āyojyam dvādaśa abdaiḥ samaśnute
uta devā iti japet āmayā avīyata vrataḥ
ghṛta kumbham nidhāya atha juhuyāt jātavedasi
kumbhāt sampātam anyasmin kāṃsya pātre nidhāpayet
yaḥ annāya alam na ca annam syāt sa edam samprakalpayet
tena ājyena aṅgam abhyajya śanakais anna bhāj bhavet
roga ārtasya api anena eva gātram aṅktvā japet idam
ajīrṇān naḥ api añjayīta sukham bhavati tena ha
agne acchāvada iti etat dhana kāmaḥ prayojayet
niyataḥ sarpiṣā a hutvā japet ayutaśas punar
khādirīṇām hi samidhām juhuyāt daśatīḥ daśa
daśa kṛtvas sa dāreṇa rāyaspoṣeṇa puṣyati
bilva audumbara pālāśīḥ tathā rauhītakīḥ cayāḥ
juhuyāt dhana kāmaḥ turāyaspoṣeṇa puṣyati
vaibhītaka aidhmaḥ bailvakīḥ juhuyāt ardha māsa bhuj
dviṣat dveṣeṇa tasya ante sūktam etat prayojayet
dviṣantam dhaninam hatvā dviṣataḥ vindate dhanam
athavā ajapyam evasya a drāyaspoṣa dhana arthinā
ayam agne jaritā iti japet agni bhaye sati
vidhinā a tarpayitvā agnim payaḥ dadhi ghṛta ādibhiḥ
svayam pātum yāvat icchet tāvat gatvā caturdiśam
apām idam pariṇayet saṃtata audaka dhārayā
udahra daiva bhūtvā agneḥ bheṣajam antikāt
araṇyam eti apāṭhā amtu krīṇīyāt yavamuṣṭinā
yadi saumya si somāya tvā parikrīṇāmi oṣadhim
yat iva aruṇī asi varuṇāya tvā parikrīṇāmi aham tatas
vasubhyaḥ athavā rudrebhyaḥ ādityebhyaḥ athavā punar
vaiśvadevī asi viśvebhyaḥ parikrīṇāmi aham tatas
kṣiptvā a sumanasaḥ pūrvam oṣadhyāḥ saha vīrudhi
tasya avīryam samādatte karma yatra kariṣyati
tām tu madhye nidadhīta oṣadhīnām vihāyasi
grahaṇe tu oṣadhīnām tu sarvatra eṣa vidhiḥ bhavet
utkhāpayīta tām pāṭhām imām iti japan iha
prātar ca peṣayet enām saṃsadi brahmacāriṇā
tad alābhe vratavatā kanyayā a brāhmaṇena vā
prātar śuciḥ tām ghṛtena tris pibet anumantritām
imām iti tu sūktena śata kṛtvas daśa avaram
sapatnīm bādhate tena patiḥ ca atīva manyate
patiḥ tu parijapya enām pāṭhām etena vā epibet
payasā sapta rātram tu sapatnān pratibādhate
mūlamantra japaiḥ anyaiḥ yāpatim jetum icchati
aloka ayam aloka sthā majjate narake hisā
anyathā ca aupanīta ani cūrṇa mūla auṣadhāni api
vināśayeyuḥ puruṣam tasmāt na anyat samācaret
priyamvadā bhartari yābharta ayasyāḥ parāyaṇam
vāc ca eva madhurā yasyāḥ patyuḥ saṃvananam mahat
priyam bhartāram āsādya apibet eva oṣadhīm imām
priyaṃvadām dharma parām dharma patnīm aninditām
avamanya itayaḥ mohāt tam āhuḥ puruṣa adhamam
araṇyānī iti araṇyeṣu japet sūktam anekaśas
araṇyānīm namaskṛtvā asaḥ araṇyāt pramucyate
śraddhāsu uktam japet nityam śraddhā kāmaḥ samāhitaḥ
sarvatra labhate śraddhām medhā sūktam tathā eva ca
tām pibet tu yathāśaktyā tri ahāt siddhim niyacchati
śaṅkhapuṣpī mtu payasā brāhmī puṣpāṇi sarpiṣā
śata avarīm tu payasā varcām adbhiḥ ghṛtena vā
sūktābhyām anumantrya ābhyām eka ekām tri aham pibet
śraddhām medhām smṛtim puṣṭim balam lakṣmīm ca vindati
siddhim prāpnoti ca parām dīrgham ca āyuḥ samaśnute
athavā āmanasā adhyāyet sūkte siddhim niyacchati
śāma etthā sapatna ghnam saṃgrāmam vijigīṣataḥ
prayoktavyam tu śucinā juhuyāt tatra siddhaye
athavā ajapyam eva syāt saṃgrāmam abhigacchataḥ
śāma etthā iti yaḥ hantum śatrūn sarvān nivārayet
alakṣmī nāśana artham tu japet nityam śirimbiṭam
apāmārga mayīm śākhām sa darbhām saha vīrudhām
gṛhītvā ātmānam pāvayet adhas ca ūrdhvam ca nityaśas
ājyam ca anena juhuyāt sahasram daśatīḥ daśa
tri aheṇa nudate dehāt alakṣmīm śata vārṣikīm
cāndrāyaṇam caran etat sūktam siddhi karam japet
alakṣmīm nudate dehāt api varṣa sahasrakīm
gṛhītam yakṣmaṇā darbhān gṛhītvā a saṃspṛśan japet
muñcāmi tvā haviṣā iti yakṣmāṇam apakarṣati
samiddham agim juhuyāt ājyena eva yathāvidhi
sampātam ājye ninayet sampātaiḥ ca payaḥ pibet
sampāta bhājane sarpiḥ cūrṇam tatra nidhāpayet
tatra asya bhojanīyam syāt pānīyam ca anumantritam
śodhayīta rasam ca eṣām madhu ājyābhyām pibet saha
muñcāmi tvā haviṣā iti tatra tatra prayojayet
yakṣmāṇam apakarṣanti śarīrāt tena karmaṇā
yasyāḥ garbhaḥ pramīyeta tatra agnau juhuyāt haviḥ
brahmaṇā agniḥ saṃvidānaḥ eti ājyena yathāvidhi
ājya śeṣeṇa ca abhyajya garbhiṇī prasavet tatas
pibet eva ājya śeṣam tu jīvan tasyāḥ prajāyate
jātāni ced pramīyeran ājyam kṛtvā anumantritam
juhuyāt brahmaṇā agniḥ iti sampātān ninayet maṇau
maṇimtu trivṛti sūtre vāsayet vāsasā saha
tam sāvitrī ayutena eva anumantrya yathāvidhi
sampātaiḥ ayutena eva brahmaṇā iti ca saṃstutam
upariṣṭāt ca sāvitryā tāvat deva anumantraṇam
sarvaiḥ svastyayanaiḥ ca etat japet abhihutam maṇim
śirasā ādhārayet nārī prayatā garbhiṇī satī
tṛtīye garbha māse tu maṇim etam samāsajet
bahu pānīya yavasā vatsena pibatā a saha
jātasya tu kumārasya kaṇṭhe tam maṇim āsajet
ājya śeṣam puraskṛtya tam abhyajya kumārakam
hutvā svastyayanaiḥ eva strī pumān samprasūyate
ūrdhvam varṣāt svastyayanam punar eva vidhīyate
puraḥstana pradānāt tam śraddhāsu uktena pāyayet
medhāsūktena ca eva enam piṣṭam vrīhi mayam carum
madhu miśram jātarūpam medhāvītena jāyate
śatam varṣāṇi jīvet ṛiyatena purā āyuṣaḥ
smṛtam eva tasya syāt ṣaṣ māsāt ca tatas param
ājyam saṃskṛtya juhuyāt dakṣibhyām te eti dvijaḥ
pāṇinā tu ghṛta aktena mūrdhānam saṃspṛśet tatas
karṇau netre ca chubukam nāsike ca eva saṃspṛśet
evam eva japet nityam yakṣmaṇaḥ vipramucyate
pūrva uktena eva kalpena yakṣma nāśanam ācaret
homena ca japaiḥ ca eva yakṣam nāśanam ācaret
apehi iti ca japet sūktam śuciḥ duh svapna nāśanam
devāḥ kapota eti tu kapotasya aupaveśane
sūktena juhuyāt ājyam yama dūtam hitam viduḥ
sapatna ghnam prayuñjīta ṛṣabham japa homayoḥ
yena edam iti vainityam japeta niyata vrataḥ
samādhim manasaḥ tena vindatena evam uhyati
mayaḥ bhūḥ vāta eti tu gavām svastyayane japet
yavānām tu ghṛta aktānām kārīṣe agnau samāhitaḥ
juhuyāt goṣṭha madhyetu dadhi madhu ājya saṃskṛtān
rājānam abhiṣiñceta tiṣyeṇa śravaṇena vā
pauṣṇa sāvitra saumya aśvi rohiṇīṣu uttarāsu ca
hutvā agnim rājaliṅgābhiḥ sāvitryā aprayataḥ śuciḥ
mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ ca eva sampāta abhihutaḥ bhavet
sarva oṣadhi rasaiḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ nadīnām salilena ca
vyāghra carmaṇi atha āsīnam āsandyām abhiṣicya ca
tiṣṭhan pratyan mukhaḥ brūyāt jayatvam pṛthivīm imām
dharmaḥ te nikhilaḥ rājan vardhatām pālayan prajāḥ
vardhasva tvam śriyai puṣṭyai jayāya abhyudayāya ca
rājānaḥ santu te gotre tatas apratiratham japet
vaiyāghramtu bhavet carma samidh audumbarībhavet
tis enam abhiṣicya evam dundubhīn abhimantrayet
prācyām tvā ādiśi vasavaḥ abhiṣiñcantu tejase
dakṣiṇasyām tvā diśi rudrāḥ abhiṣiñcantu vṛddhaye
pratīcyām tvā ādiśi ādityāḥ abhiṣiñcantu puṣṭaye
viśve devāḥ udīcyām tu abhiṣiñcantu śreyase
abhiṣicya ca rājānam āśīrbhiḥ abhinandya ca
ā tvā ahārṣam antaredhī iti atha enam abhimantrayet
pataṅgam iti nityam tu japet ajñāna bhedanam
māyā bhedanam etat hi sarva māyāḥ prabādhate
śāmbarīm indrajālām vāmāyām etena vārayet
adṛṣṭānām ca sattvānām māyām etena bādhate
ti amūṣu iti svastyayanam japeta niyata vrataḥ
puṣpam
viṣṇuḥ yonim neja meṣa yonim spṛṣṭvā tatas japet
mahitrīṇām avaḥ astu iti pathi svastyayane japet
pra agnaye atha dviṣat dveṣyam japet dveṣasya niṣkṛtim
ā ayam gauḥ sārpa rājñīḥ tu sarvān etena bādhate
pavitrāṇām pavitram tu japet eva aghamarṣaṇam
apaḥ praviśya yaḥ ca etat tris paṭhet su samāhitaḥ
yathā aśvamedha avabhṛthaḥ tādṛśam manuḥ abravīt
yathā aśvamedhaḥ kratu rāj sarva pāpa praṇodanaḥ
tathā aghamarṣaṇam sūktam sarva pāpa praṇodanam
senā dāraṇam etat syāt nairhastyam iti śaunakaḥ
manasā adhyeyam etat tu manyate śaunakaḥ tu ṛṣiḥ
sam samidh yuvase vṛṣan sau bhrātṛ karaṇam mahat
jñāti bhede prayuñjītana bhidyante kadācana
na tatra bhedaḥ bhūyas syāt yatra etat satatam japet
tat śamyoḥ āvṛṇīmahe iti svastyayane japet
sapatna ghnyaḥ ca puṇyāḥ ca pāvamānyaḥ parāḥ smṛtāḥ
vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ japet ca etāḥ āpohiṣṭhāḥ sanātanāḥ
omkāra pūrvāḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ madhucchandasa āditaḥ
sūktāni ante mahānāmnyaḥ saṃhitā asā amṛtā smṛtā
amṛta tvam yayuḥ devāḥ pūrvam sahitayā anayā
japet etām śuciḥ nityam amṛta tvam sa gacchati
atra eva tu āvapet madhye pitṛ sūktāni anekaśas
pitryām tām saṃhitām vidyāt pitṝn prīṇāti ca etayā
evam eva samāhṛtya vāsavī saṃhitā bhavet
raudra ādityā vaiśvadevī yad devatyām ca kāmayet
kurvīta vāstuśamanam madhye goṣṭhasya dharma vid
puṣpaiḥ gandhaiḥ ca mālyaiḥ ca vānaspatyaiḥ tathā auṣadhaiḥ
vāstu sarvam pratikiret saptadhānyaiḥ tathā eva ca
vāstoṣpatim yajet ca atra pāyasena bṛhaspatim
audumbara palāśaiḥ ca balim pratidiśam haret
sūryaḥ vāyuḥ yamaḥ pitaraḥ varuṇaḥ nirṛtiḥ tathā
somaḥ mahā indraḥ iti etāḥ dikṣu vaidevatāḥ smṛtāḥ
dadyāt dānam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śivam bhavati vāstuni
pratisaṃvatsaram kāryam gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā
